turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order a couple of pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get two medium pizzas? One I want

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: anchovies and pepperoni and the other one i want a buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas, one achovies and pepperoni and 1 buffalo chicken, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Can I get extra cheese on both of them, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $40, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I just want to make sure I got two medium pizzas One with anchovies and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What was the other one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And both of them have extra cheese, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's correct

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick-up or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick-up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thanks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
